results.title: The Shoemaker
results.creator_credit: Adam Nudelman, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Artist Adam Nudelman asks himself why he always paints shoes? Behind these objects lies a story about family and loss and brings him closer to his Jewish heritage. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia
results.creator_credit_for_label: Adam Nudelman, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: My beautiful shwesters
results.creator_credit: Adam Barolsky, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Adam Barolsky laments the distance he has put between himself and his sisters to find a better life. He tells a tale of deep sorrow and concern for the welfare of the family he has left behind. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Adam Barolsky, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Adam Barolsky laments the distance he has put between himself and his sisters to find a better life. results.title: Hyper-Ballad
results.creator_credit: Firas Massouh, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Firas Massouh’s hunger for travel was started by his father who, as a communist activist, moved to Russia from Syria where he met his wife. With baby in tow, the family began a lifelong journey of travelling, which was continued by Firas when he decided to continue his father’s travels and move to Melbourne.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Firas Massouh, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Firas Massouh’s hunger for travel was started by his father who, as a communist activist, moved to Russia from Syria where he met his wife. With baby in tow, the family began a lifelong journey of travelling, which was continued by Firas when he decided to continue his father’s travels and move to Melbourne.

results.title: Avustralyadan bir enstantane...
results.creator_credit: Bayram Ocal, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Bayram Ocal reflects on his many achievements since migrating to Australia in the late sixties, including contributing to the foundation of a Turkish Islamic society, an Islamic funeral service, a mosque and various Turkish language newspapers.

results.title: Yeni dunyam = My new world
results.creator_credit: Yusuf Hazar, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Migrating to Australia from Ankara, Turkey in 1978, Yusuf Hazar fondly looks back on the life he and his wife created for his six children. Feeling a deep sense of gratitude to his adopted country, Yusuf and his family are committed to helping out others in the community.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Yusuf Hazar, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: From a small island to a giant continent : the story of a Cypriot Turk
results.creator_credit: Ifran Hassan, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Ifran Hassan recalls leaving his homeland of Cyprus in 1970 to escape the troubled political climate, his destination, Melbourne where he set out to make a new life for himself and to help improve the lives of others.
results.title_for_label: From a small island to a giant continent : the story of a Cypriot Turk
results.creator_credit_for_label: Ifran Hassan, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Without a doubt
results.creator_credit: Lyn Skillern, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: John Rouse, a kind and fun loving man from Yorkshire loved to dress as Santa and even had his own catch phrase, ‘without a doubt’. His daughter-in-law Lyn Skillern and her family remember and pay tribute to him.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Lyn Skillern, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
